thread.title: 33 Shades of Green: Photos that Explore the Power of Color
thread.title_full: 33 Shades of Green: Photos that Explore the Power of Color

author: Alejandro Santiago
title: 33 Shades of Green: Photos that Explore the Power of Color
text:
33 Shades of Green: Photos that Explore the Power of Color Published by Alejandro Santiago • 15 hours ago 
Yup, it’s St. Patrick’s Day once again—and we’ve put together some visual inspiration to get you in the spirit. Green is known as the color of luck and prosperity symbolizing harmony, freshness, and safety. Here’s a collection of portraits, travel, landscape, still life, and street photography in 33 different shades of green, shot by 500px photographers all over the world. 
Learn how to incorporate color into your portraits by reading Brian Wilson’s article: 5 Color Techniques to Use For Striking Portraits . Related
